title: Upcoming Flutter Events
subtitle: Join us for exciting workshops and meetups

events.title: Flutter State Management Workshop
events.description: Deep dive into state management solutions in Flutter. Learn about Provider, Riverpod, and BLoC patterns with hands-on exercises.

events.title: Building Beautiful UIs with Flutter
events.description: Master the art of creating stunning user interfaces with Flutter. Topics include custom widgets, animations, and responsive design patterns.

events.title: Flutter Testing Masterclass
events.description: A comprehensive guide to testing Flutter applications, covering unit tests, widget tests, and integration tests with best practices.

events.title: Flutter for Web Development
events.description: Exploring Flutter web capabilities, PWA support, and deployment strategies for web applications built with Flutter.
